value:
I have seen others burn with passion
that utterly consumes them...$k$pI do not believe I have this capacity.
And I have come to see that as a
weakness.

It is with good reason that Lady Ishtar
is called the Goddess of Thunder.$k$pThe amount of magical power she
commands is far beyond my grasp.

Guard your health, and guard it well.
As long as we have you, there's little
chance this army will be defeated.

Leif is the enemy. However, being
here—another place, another time—
may allow me to tread another path.

When the subject turns to tactical
geniuses, only two names ought to
be spoken: Saias's...and yours.

You may think it rude that I don't
dismount. You would be correct.$k$pStill and all, I bid you greetings on
behalf of $Nf.$k$pNow, if you'll excuse me, an urgent
mission requires my attention.

Friege rains thunder on its foes.
An instant later, they are gone.

To wield both blade and tome...
This is what it means to be a
mage knight.

I beg you—give me a chance to
reclaim my honor.

My gratitude is boundless. I
promise excellent results.

I am Reinhardt of Friege, the mage
knight.$k$pLest you think my talents are limited
to magic, let me demonstrate to you
my skill with a blade.

Long ago, I fought Prince Leif and
his army at the River Thracia.$k$pWe had the advantage. My forces
outnumbered his, and my position
was more favorable.$k$pAnd yet I was defeated. But how? To
what do I ascribe my failure?$k$pThinking about it now, I believe the
question is one of spirit.$k$pWhatever the odds against them,
Prince Leif's forces possessed a
will strong enough to grasp victory.$k$pTheir determination shone, and it was
something I lacked. That, I suppose,
is my weakness.$k$pHowever, fighting by your side has
helped me conquer this failing in
myself.$k$pMy will is strong. As long as it lasts,
I will bring you victory.
はぁっ！
Sorry!
うああっ！
A blunder...
Forgive me.
Excuse me.
I'll show you how it's done.
Forward, now!
My regrets...
Chuckle
I am Reinhardt, a knight of Friege.
Eh? You have the mischievous heart of a child.
In battle, a mage-knight should be equipped with more than just magic, my friend.
I can fight at my utmost thanks to you.
Your stratagems... It's almost as though you can espy the battlefield as a whole.
Olwen... It seems you've chosen your own path, my sister.
Perhaps the person I ought to serve...is you.
Understood.
You are good.
As you planned.
